page.title: 05Houghton-Daily Life
page.content: I woke up on a Monday morning,got derssed & went downstairs to have breakfast.After breakfast I went upstairs & got washed & dressed.I got my swimming things & my euphonium ready & then walked out to the car.We went through to Washington,dropped my Mam off & back to Newbottle & dropped me off.At school the first lesson was maths then after break we went swimming.At the baths we tried picking bricks up from the bottom of the pool. After dinner we had craft with Mr. Pringle & after break we did some singing.At 4pm. we went to Bernard Gilpin School band practice.At 6pm.I went home,had my tea then sat down & watched the television,after that I went upstairs to bed. By Daniel Henderson,Aged 10
